item.description:
2 Part Seminar:

1. Market Snapshot - Looking at the current market and answering questions on Home Buying and Investing and how to get financed.

2. Buying Investment Properties - Bank Foreclosures and Short Sales.
Learn how to structure and make offers, and find financing that's right for you and your business.

Follow this link to register for the Webinar: https://www1.gotomeet...
item.how_to_find_us: This is a Webinar - do not go to the Crowne Plaza!!

group.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group
